summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2478 for the improvement of Eighth Avenue Northeast, from East Fifty-fifth Street to East Sixty-fifth Street; the north one-half of East Fifty-fifth Street, from Fifth Avenue Northeast to Ninth Avenue Northeast, all in The City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing cross-walks, and providing for the necessary surface and subdrainage; under Ordinance No. 26260, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
